text: Khoiful Mukhib (born 15 December 1990) is an Indonesian male mountain cyclist. In the 2018 Asian Games, he won a gold medal for downhill cycling after scoring a time of 2 minutes, 16.687 seconds. He was born in Jepara, Central Java on 15 December 1990. He married his wife in 2017, and she was pregnant during the Asian Games. Before participating in the games, he had won several national competitions as part of the 76 team, which he joined in 2009. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Indonesia Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:People from Jepara Category:Sportspeople from Central Java
title: Khoiful Mukhib
